name: cfpresenter
description:
Describes a presenter in a slide presentation. A slide presentation can have multiple presenters.
 The presenters must be referenced from the slides defined by the cfpresentationslide tag.

params.name: biography
params.description: Specifies the biography of the presenter. (required)

params.name: email
params.description: The name to use for the JavaScript proxy class. (optional)

params.name: image
params.description:
Specifies the path for the presenter's image in JPEG format.
 The JPG file must be relative to theCFM page. (optional)

params.name: name
params.description: Specifies the name of the presenter. (required)

params.name: logo
params.description:
Specifies the path for the presenter's logo or the logo of
 the presenters organization. The logo must be in JPEG format.
 The file must be relative to the CFM page. (optional)

params.name: title
params.description: Specifies the title of the presenter. (optional)

example.title: A presentation with two slides
example.code:
<cfpresentation
	title = "text string"
	authPassword = "authentication password"
	authUser = "authentication user name"
	autoPlay = "yes"
	backgroundColor = "##cccccc"
	control = "normal"
	controlLocation = "right"
	format = "ppt"
	glowColor = "green"
	initialTab = "notes"
	destination = "ram:///filepath"
	directory = "praesi.ppt"
	lightColor = "yellow"
	loop = "no"
	overwrite = "yes"
	primaryColor = "blue"
	shadowColor = "##333333"
	showNotes = "yes"
	showOutline = "yes"
	showSearch = "yes"
	textColor = "black"
	userAgent = "Firefox"
>
<cfpresentationslide notes=
